segments.text: You are an outgoing person , quite easy to talk with .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , my friends like to get along with me well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I like to make new friends .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you usually do with them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We like to get together , chat and enjoy beautiful music .
segments.speaker: S2
